statements: SELECT * FROM hospital_admission_data ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_code FROM hospital_admission_data WHERE admission_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM hospital_admission_data WHERE diagnosis_code = 'COVID';
SELECT * FROM hospital_admission_data WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM hospital_admission_data ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM hospital_admission_data;
SELECT * FROM hospital_admission_data WHERE diagnosis_code = 'COVID19';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date FROM hospital_admission_data WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_code FROM hospital_admission_data ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT diagnosis_code) AS unique_diagnoses FROM hospital_admission_data;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE admission_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT diagnosis_name, diagnosis_code FROM diagnoses
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis_name FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.diagnosis = diagnoses.diagnosis_code WHERE diagnosis_name LIKE '%viral%';
SELECT diagnosis_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.diagnosis = diagnoses.diagnosis_code GROUP BY diagnosis_name HAVING patient_count > 5;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC, admission_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, admission_date FROM Patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Diagnoses.diagnosis_name FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Admissions WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patient
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patient
SELECT diagnosis, age FROM Patient
SELECT * FROM Admission
SELECT admission_id, patient_id, admission_date FROM Admission
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT name, age FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis FROM Patient WHERE age > 50;
SELECT p.name, a.admission_date, d.diagnosis_name FROM Patient p JOIN Admission a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id JOIN Diagnosis d ON p.diagnosis = d.diagnosis_id;
SELECT p.name, r.record_id, d.description FROM Patient p JOIN MedicalRecord r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id JOIN Diagnosis d ON r.diagnosis_id = d.diagnosis_id ORDER BY r.record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT admission_id, patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Admissions WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_description FROM Treatments WHERE admission_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT admission_date, discharge_date FROM Admissions WHERE discharge_date IS NULL ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT diagnosis_name FROM Diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_id IN (1, 2, 3);
